name: Kikkoman Soy Sauce - Traditionally Brewed, Reduced Sodium Content, Healthy and Authentic, Ideal for Stir-Fries and Marinades – 20 Fl Oz, Pack of 1
short_description: LESS SODIUM CONTENT: The Kikkoman Soy Sauce contains less sodium compared to regular soy sauce, making it a healthier option for those watching their salt intake.
AUTHENTIC FLAVOR: It adds depth to your dishes with its rich, delicious flavor, which is characteristic of Kikkoman Soy Sauce, even with less sodium content.
HEALTHY: This Soy Sauce contains mixed proportion of water, wheat, salt and lactic acid. Sodium Benzoate is used in limited quantity to preserve the sauce.
VERSATILE INGREDIENT: This Soy Sauce is perfect for use in various recipes, including stir-fries, marinades, dipping sauces, and dressings that enhances the taste of your favorite dishes.
CONVENIENT PACKAGING: The 20 Fl. Oz bottle is conveniently sized for easy handling and storage, ensuring you have this essential sauce readily available in your kitchen.
product_description: Kikkoman Low Sodium Soy Sauce, 20 fluid ounces. Best for Eating Sushi or Use as a Condiment. Kikkoman, Famous Soy Sauce from Japan and One of the Oldest Brand In the World, Over 300 Years、

name: Traditionally Brewed Regular Soy Sauce - 38% Less Sodium, All Purpose Seasoning - 64 fl oz (2 qt) - Pack of 2
short_description: Versatile Seasoning: Low Sodium Soy Sauce is the ultimate all-purpose seasoning, enhancing the flavor of Asian cuisines and Western dishes alike. Perfect for stir-fries, marinades, soups, and more.
Reduced Sodium: Enjoy the rich umami flavor you love with 38% less sodium. Perfect for those seeking a healthier option without compromising the authentic soy sauce experience.
Traditionally Brewed: Made with carefully selected ingredients and traditionally brewed to deliver a rich, complex flavor.
Certified Kosher: Enjoy a soy sauce that’s certified kosher. Ideal for all your favorite recipes.
Pack of 2: Stock up with this pack of two 64 fluid ounce (2 qt) bottles of low sodium soy sauce. Perfect for large households, meal prepping, or enhancing meals with ease.
product_description: This Low Sodium Soy Sauce, available in a generous 64 fl oz bottle (2 qt), is crafted from carefully selected ingredients to deliver a premium seasoning experience. Known for its fine aroma, composed of approximately 300 unique components, and its well-balanced mix of the five basic flavors, this soy sauce satisfies even the most discerning palates. As an all-purpose seasoning, it enhances the flavors of a wide variety of dishes, from traditional Asian recipes to Western cuisines, making it a versatile kitchen essential & perfect for elevating your favorite meals while catering to your dietary preferences.

name: Best Of Thailand Premium Lite Soy Sauce Low Sodium | 2 Bottles of Lite Soy Sauce 23.65oz Real Authentic Asian-Brewed Marinade for Marinating Fish, Meat & Roasted Vegetables | 75% Less sodium
short_description: AWARD WINNER MULTI PURPOSE DARK SOY SAUCE LITE AND LOW SODIUM – This bundle pack of 2 bottles of Lite Soy Sauce by Best of Thailand is not your ordinary kitchen ingredient. consider adding this healthy Asian sauce to add texture and taste whether you are preparing Grilled Food, Meat, Fish, Pasta, Sushi or roasted vegetables, made of soybeans, water, salt, sugar, wheat, stabilizers, and preservatives, 70% LESS SODIUM than regular Soy Sauce and is slightly sweeter, overall more intense flavor.

AUTHENTIC ASIAN TASTE, NO MSG – Thailand is known for its dishes that are rich in flavors – Tom Yum, Pad Thai, Kaho Pad, Kai Med Ma Muang, to name a few. However, these dishes will not be complete without a soy sauce like this, real Asian brewed and Kosher certified. Don't believe it? Try cooking these Thai dishes without the Best of Thailand Soy Sauce and taste the difference!

HANDY SQUEEZABLE CONTAINERS – Most soy sauces in the grocery today are all the same. So we made ours a stand out. To allow the consistent sauce to flow out with ease, all you need to do is open the lid and squeeze the container. Don't worry if it slips your hand. The bottle does not break when it falls. Rest assured all the contents will not be thrown away that easy!

KOSHER CERTIFIED WITH TOP QUALITY CONTROL – This top rated Dipping Sauce is certified to be kosher parve and vegan that is quality checked under the prevision of Rabbi Westheim & Manchester Beth Din, Not only the ingredients are inspected, even the equipment are thoroughly cleaned and koshered (special sanitization) to ensure the top quality products.

70% LESS SODIUM DARK SOY SAUCE – As you, we do love dark soy sauce and also being healthy, that’s why we take the most trusted professionals to develop this soy sauce that will make magic with just few tablespoonfuls. Also, the sodium level on this amazing low sodium soy sauce will friendly take care of your vision, pressure and heart being one of the best to include on your diet. Even with 70% less sodium dark soy sauce we do have 100% committed customer service, feel free to contact us.

name: SEMPIO Low Sodium Naturally Brewed Soy Sauce - with 25% Less Salt, Made in Korea, Premium, Savory Flavor Enhancer, Multi-purpose, Authentic Korean Cuisine. (29.08 fl oz / 860ml, Vegan, Non-GMO)​
short_description: 📅 𝐄𝐗𝐏𝐈𝐑𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐃𝐀𝐓𝐄 𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐓: 𝐘𝐘𝐘𝐘.𝐌𝐌.𝐃𝐃

NATURALLY BREWED SOY SAUCE, LESS SALT - Our premium soy sauce maintains the rich taste and aroma of traditional soy sauce while reducing sodium levels by over 25%. Perfect for everyday meals, healthy recipes, low-sodium diets, and even children's dishes.

SLOW & AUTHENTIC FERMENTATION - Made through a meticulous 5-stage fermentation process lasting over 5 months, our 100% naturally brewed soy sauce is crafted with the finest yeast and probiotics. From soybean fermentation to low-temperature fermentation, probiotic fermentation, yeast fermentation, and maturation, each step ensures optimal flavor development.

PURE SEA SALT FROM SHINAN - We use pure, mineral-rich sea salt sourced from the pristine waters of Shinan, South Korea. This enhances the taste and aroma of our soy sauce, adding an extra layer of richness to your culinary creations.
QUALITY – Non-GMO, Safe Quality Food (SQF) Certification & HACCP certification. Sempio seeks to contribute better values to a tastier and healthier lifestyle based on advanced technology.

SEMPIO - South Korea’s number one household brand specializing in fermented foods. For over 70 years, we have used our experience to craft a product that can be enjoyed by everyone. The philosophy of its founder, “I will never produce or sell products that my family would not eat,” Sempio puts special emphasis on food safety and health.

name: Yamasa, Reduced Sodium Shoyu Artisanal Soy Sauce, Non-GMO, Glass Bottle with Dispenser, 5 fl oz
short_description: Ancient Traditions, Extraordinary Flavors. At Yamasa, we have been brewing artisanal shoyu (Japanese soy sauce) for four centuries. Beloved by Japan’s greatest chefs and today crafted in the shadow of Oregon’s beautiful Cascades.
Our Reduced Sodium Shoyu’s distinct red color, aroma and umami enhance and bring balance to any meal with 25% less sodium than Yamasa Regular Shoyu.
Excellent with sushi, or add for nuanced flavor in sauces, burgers, soups and more.
Authentically Crafted, No MSG, Non-GMO and Artificial Preservative Free.
5 fl oz glass dispenser bottle

name: Aloha Shoyu - Lower Salt Soy Sauce with 25% Less Sodium - Versatile and Balanced Shoyu Sauce - Made in Hawaii - 1 Gallon
short_description: BALANCED BLEND: Our Lower Salt Soy Sauce has a medium salt-sweet taste that allows you to add full flavor to your dishes while limiting your sodium intake. A great sauce that accommodates to the sodium-consciences diets.
REDUCED SODIUM: Aloha Shoyu's Lower Salt Soy Sauce has 25% less sodium than our original blend but still carries our great, slightly sweet shoyu flavor!

PREMIUM SHOYU FLAVOR: Aloha Shoyu products are made with bold and sweet ingredients consisting of fermented soybeans and sugar - creating an authentic experience that reflects our deeply rooted island heritage, melded and infused with our Japanese origin.

DELIVERING DISH HARMONY: Aloha Shoyu's balanced blend of soy and umami flavors creates the finest pairing for any meal or recipe. A grilled hawaiian chicken or a spinach and carrot salad provides a great canvas for our shoyu.

MADE IN HAWAII: Since 1946, tradition, local roots, and stellar flavor is what makes Aloha Shoyu products a favorite among Hawaiian islanders and visitors alike, so serve up your next favorite dish with a little Aloha.

short_description: Add a dash of Asian-inspired flavor to your favorite meals with La Choy Soy Sauce
La Choy Soy Sauce is an essential, all-purpose sauce that adds a burst of authentic Asian flavor to a variety of dishes
Sprinkle La Choy Soy Sauce over rice, or add it to a simple stir fry for a quick, delicious meal
Inspired by traditional Asian cuisine, La Choy Soy Sauce combines distinctive flavor with convenience
Each 15 Ounce bottle of La Choy Soy Sauce contains 10 calories and 0 grams of fat per serving
